# Overview
Makes posthoc plots for diagnosis of LandR

# Usage

```{r module_usage}

RUN <- "1"
hostIp <- "68"
vegetation<-"LandR.CS"
fire<-"fS"
usrEmail <- "tati.micheletti@gmail.com" # Your e.mail for GDrive authorization
updateCRAN <- FALSE
updateGithubPackages <- FALSE
updateSubmodules <- FALSE
isTest <- FALSE # runMe
Sys.sleep(1)
runOnlySimInit <- FALSE # TRUE to run experiment, FALSE to run simulations individually
onlyLoadDEOptim <- TRUE
runName <- "NWT_BCR6"
Sys.sleep(1)
replicateNumber <- paste0("run", RUN)
Sys.sleep(1)
originalDateAnalysis <- "14AUG20" # <~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
runLandR <- FALSE # <~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
runBirds <- FALSE
runCaribou <- FALSE
runPosthoc <- TRUE
birdModelVersion <- "6a"
Sys.sleep(3)
source("1_generalSetup.R")
source("2_generatingInputs.R")

times <- list(start = 1, end = 1)

parameters <- list(
  posthocLandR = list(
    "years" = c(seq(2011, 2091, by = 10), 2100),
    "saveRAS" = TRUE,
    "addCaribousuitability" = TRUE,
    "plotFireStats" = TRUE,
    "overwriteBurnSumm" = FALSE,
    "sppEquivCol" = runName
    )
)
modules <- list("posthocLandR")

objects <- list(
  resultsFolders = list(
    LandR.CS_fS_run1 = file.path(getwd(), originalDateAnalysis, "LandR.CS_fS/run1"),
    LandR.CS_fS_run2 = file.path(getwd(), originalDateAnalysis, "LandR.CS_fS/run2"),
    LandR_SCFM_run1 = file.path(getwd(), originalDateAnalysis, "LandR_SCFM/run1"),
    LandR_SCFM_run2 = file.path(getwd(), originalDateAnalysis, "LandR_SCFM/run2")
  ),
  sppColorVect = sppColorVect,
  sppEquivalencies_CA = sppEquivalencies_CA
)
inputs <- list()
outputs <- list()

posthocResultsLandR <- simInitAndSpades(times = times, 
                                        params = parameters, 
                                        modules = modules,
                                        objects = objects, debug = 1)

```
